info.title: API ezMESURE
info.description: Use this API to interact with [ezMESURE](https://ezmesure.couperin.org).

UnauthorizedError.description: Access token is missing or invalid

ForbiddenError.description: Action is forbidden for the authenticated user

NotFoundError.description: The requested resource was not found

ConflictError.description: Action is conflicted with the current state of the resource

ItemDeleteDate.description: When item was marked for deletion

onboarding.description: True when the institution should be added to new users

validated.description: True when the institution has been validated

hidePartner.description: Whether to hide the institution in the partner list

logoId.description: Identifier of the institution logo image

uai.description: UAI (Unité Administrative Immatriculée) of the institution

sushiReadySince.description: Date since which SUSHI credentials are ready

InstitutionProperty.description: Institution property, ie. a value associated with a custom field

isAdmin.description: Whether the user has admin permissions

metadata.description: Metadata properties associated to the user

Membership.description: Represent a membership between a user and an institution

user.description: The user that belongs to the institution

institution.description: The institution that user is member of

roles.description: A list of user roles in the institution

permissions.description: A list of user permissions associated to the institution

locked.description: Whether the member can be modified or not

institutionProperties.description: The institution associated to this space

multiple.description: Whether the field accept multiple values

editable.description: Whether the field can be edited by regular users

visible.description: Whether the field should be visible to regular users

descriptionEn.example: The ISTEX identifier of the institution

helpUrl.description: URL (if any) to a page containing explanations about that field

itemUrl.description: URL (if any) to the page dedicated to the institution

id.description: ID of the space. The institution namespace is used as a prefix when the actual Kibana space is created.

institution.description: The institution associated to this space

institutionId.description: ID of the institution associated to this space

imageUrl.description: Space logo as a base64 data URL

permissions.description: List of permissions associated to this space

SpacePermission.description: Represent access permissions of a user to a specific space

user.description: The user associated to this permission

space.description: The space associated to this permission

readonly.description: Whether the user has read of read/write access to the space

locked.description: Whether the permission can be modified by admins only

Repository.description: Represent a section of ElasticSearch indices

RepositoryPermission.description: Represent permissions of a user for a repository

locked.description: Whether the permission can be modified by admins only

RepositoryAliasPermission.description: Represent permissions of a user for an alias

locked.description: Whether the permission can be modified by admins only

RepositoryAliasTemplate.description: A template that can generate repository aliases for the institutions that match a list of conditions

active.description: Whether the template should be applied automatically

conditions.description: A list of condition to select the institutions used to generate the aliases

filters.description: The filters that should be added to the generated aliases

aliases.description: The aliases that was generated by the template

repository.description: The target repository for the generated aliases

Action.description: Represent an activity associated to an institution

institutionId.description: ID of the institution concerned by the action

institution.description: The institution concerned by the action

authorId.description: Username of the user that triggered the action

author.description: The user that triggered the action

data.description: Arbitrary data associated with the action (comment message, old/new state...)

HarvestJob.description: Represent the actual execution of a SUSHI harvest

runningTime.description: Running time of the job in milliseconds

reportType.description: The report type that should be harvested

harvestId.description: Arbitrary identifier, used to group jobs from a same harvest batch

index.description: Target index where report will be inserted

errorCode.description: The error code, if a fatal exception was encountered

beginDate.description: Begin date of the period to be harvested

endDate.description: End date of the period to be harvested

credentialsQuery.description: Query used to get credentials to harvest

allowFaulty.description: Allow faulty endpoints to be harvested

forceDownload.description: Whether to download the report even if a local copy exists

sendEndMail.description: Whether a mail should be sent when session ended

ignoreValidation.description: Try to import the report even if validation fails

harvestable.description: Count of credentials that will be harvested

jobStatuses.description: Count of jobs with a given status

Harvest.description: Represent the harvest state for a period and a set of credentials

status.description: Status of the harvest (which is the same as the associated harvest job)

errorCode.description: The error code, if a fatal exception was encountered

sushiExceptions.description: The SUSHI exceptions returned by the endpoint

insertedItems.description: Number of report items that were successfuly inserted into Elasticsearch

updatedItems.description: Number of report items that were updated in Elasticsearch

failedItems.description: Number of report items that failed to be inserted into Elasticsearch

counterVersions.description: Counter versions found in aggregated harvests

reportIds.description: Report ids found in aggregated harvests

counts.description: Count of each status found in aggregated harvests

beginDate.description: Start if the period found in aggregated harvests

endDate.description: End if the period found in aggregated harvests

inserted.description: Number of report items that were successfuly inserted into Elasticsearch

updated.description: Number of report items that were updated in Elasticsearch

failed.description: Number of report items that failed to be inserted into Elasticsearch

Step.description: Represents a step in a processing job

job.description: The job associated to this step

startedAt.description: Time when the step has started processing

runningTime.description: Running time of the step in milliseconds

data.description: Arbitrary data associated to the step

counterVersions.description: The COUNTER version supported by the endpoint

technicalProvider.description: The technical provider that operates the SUSHI endpoint

ignoreReportValidation.description: Whether to ignore the validation of the harvested reports

requireCustomerId.description: Whether the endpoint requires a customer ID

requireRequestorId.description: Whether the endpoint requires a requestor ID

requireApiKey.description: Whether the endpoint requires a API key

paramSeparator.description: Separator to be use for multivaluated SUSHI parameters (defaults to '|')

credentials.description: SUSHI credentials associated with this endpoint

params.description: List of default parameters associated with this endpoint

SushiCredentials.description: A set of credentials for a given SUSHI endpoint

activeUpdatedAt.description: Date of the last change of the credentials active state

archivedUpdatedAt.description: Date of the last change of the credentials archived state

institution.description: The institution that owns the credentials

endpoint.description: The SUSHI endpoint associated with the credentials

customerId.description: Customer ID to be used for the endpoint

requestorId.description: Requestor ID to be used for the endpoint

apiKey.description: API key to be used for the endpoint

packages.description: Packages (profiles, accounts, funds...) that include the credentials

tags.description: Arbitrary list of tags associated to the credentials

params.description: SUSHI parameters that should be added when requesting the endpoint

connection.description: State of the latest connection test

status.description: Status of the connection. Success if the harvest test succeeded, or if exceptions are not related to authentication. Unauthorized if the credentials are invalid. Failed if an error occurred.

date.description: Date of the latest connection test

exceptions.description: Exceptions that was thrown by the latest connection test

errorCode.description: The error code, if an exception was encountered

harvestJobs.description: Harvest jobs associated with the credentials

harvests.description: Harvest requests associated with the credentials

runningTime.description: Running time of the synchronization, in milliseconds

hasErrors.description: Whether errors occurred during the synchronization

failed.description: Number of consultations that failed to be inserted

errors.description: First error messages from consultations that failed to be inserted

min.description: minimum date covered by the documents

max.description: maximum date covered by the documents

days.description: number of days covered by all documents

institutionId.description: ID of the institution that owns the sushi item

endpointId.description: ID of the associated SUSHI endpoint

updatedAt.description: Last modification of the sushi item

createdAt.description: Creation date of the sushi item

connection.description: State of the latest connection test

success.description: Whether the latest connection test succeeded

date.description: Date of the latest connection test

exceptions.description: Exceptions that was thrown by the latest connection test

errorCode.description: The error code, if a fatal exception was encountered

params.description: Parameters that should be added in the query string

conditions.description: A list of condition to select the institutions used to generate the aliases

paused.description: Whether the queue is currently paused

parameters.description: The space where the dashboard should be imported

errors.description: The number of institutions that failed to be updated

get.description: List the existing indices you are allowed to see.

post.description: Insert access events into an index.

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: the index where the data should be inserted

parameters.name: Split-Fields
parameters.description: a list of multivalued fields, formatted as __"fieldname(delimitor)"__, and separated with whitespaces. Example: __"ezproxy-groups(+) subjects(,)"__

delete.description: Remove access events from an index. Defaults to everything if no condition provided.

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: the index where the data should be removed

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Earliest date of the events that should be removed. Can be either a date or datetime in ISO format.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Latest date of the events that should be removed. Can be either a date or datetime in ISO format.

get.summary: Get top metrics for an index
get.description: Get top metrics for an index.

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: The index to get tops from.

post.description: Perform search in indices using Elasticsearch Search API.

externalDocs.description: More about Elasticsearch Query DSL and aggregations can be found on

200.description: Raw response as returned by Elasticsearch

get.summary: Export all aggregated combinations of the given fields
get.description: Export all aggregated combinations of the given fields

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: The index that contains the consultations to be aggregated

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of fields that should be aggregated

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Start date of the period to be aggregated

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: End date of the period to be aggregated

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: A list of filters in O-Rison format, that should be applied before performing the aggregation

simple.description: Filter a single value by specifying a field and a value. Strings containing spaces should be surrounded by simple quotes `'`.

multiple.description: Filter multiple values by placing them inside `!( )`.

range.description: Filter a numeric range by using `gt`/`gte`/`lt`/`lte` inside `( )`.

negate.description: Negate a filter by placing it inside `(not: )`

parameters.name: delimiter
parameters.description: Delimiter for the CSV output. Use `tab` to get tab-seperated values.

post.summary: Export aggregated COUNTER metrics into another index
post.description: Export aggregated COUNTER metrics into another index

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: the index that contains the consultations to be aggregated

destination.description: The index where aggregations should be stored

platform.description: filter aggregations for a specific platform

sessionField.description: The field that holds the session ID, for unique request/investigation counting
